channel.title: Crash in the chapter Questionable Ethic
channel.description: That is one of my friends who get this problem. In the beginning of the chapter Questionable Ethic, when he get this loading area, the game will crash everytime He has try to reload the chapter, then to reload the whole game, and to verify the integrity of the game, and uninstall the chinese_patch. But when he get to this area, the game still crashed He don't know why, neither I. So I come here and report this issue instead of him. This is where his game crashed and get back to the desktop [img]https://imgsrc.baidu.com/forum/pic/item/bccd36d3d539b600b28918dbe050352ac65cb71e.jpg[/img] And here is the dump document crash_bms.exe_20170103200853_1.zip (42.1 KB) Hope you can check what it happened to the loading process, thanks a lot!

item.title: Crash in the chapter Questionable Ethic
item.dc:creator: RedEye
item.description:
Here is something you can do to rule out a corrupt save game.
Restart the chapter from the New Game menu and choose the unlocked chapter.
Or you could just restart the individual map.
Type status in console, make note of the map name (example bm_c2a4c ). Then type “map bm_c2a4c” into console. This will start the map as a new game.

Read full topic
item.source: Crash in the chapter Questionable Ethic

item.title: Crash in the chapter Questionable Ethic
item.dc:creator: chenmozx
item.description:
That is one of my friends who get this problem. In the beginning of the chapter Questionable Ethic, when he get this loading area, the game will crash everytime

He has try to reload the chapter, then to reload the whole game, and to verify the integrity of the game, and uninstall the chinese_patch. But when he get to this area, the game still crashed

He don’t know why, neither I. So I come here and report this issue instead of him.

This is where his game crashed and get back to the desktop

1024×768

And here is the dump document
crash_bms.exe_20170103200853_1.zip (42.1 KB)

Hope you can check what it happened to the loading process, thanks a lot!

Read full topic
item.source: Crash in the chapter Questionable Ethic
